code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./reducers";var initialState={};var middleware=[thunk];var composeEnhancers=composeWithDevTools({trace:true,traceLimit:25});var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));export default store;
